scripts.postinstall: npm run initDesktop && npm run initCli
scripts.initDesktop: cd node_modules/@tremho/jove-desktop && npm install && cd buildPack && npm install
scripts.test-headless: sudo xvfb :1337 & export DISPLAY=:1337 && echo Testing.... && jove test exit
scripts.jove-test: npm install && npm run postinstall && jove build && echo "contents of build folder" && ls build && echo "Running test now" && npm run test-headless
